attributes.action: Allow the public to purchase cryptocurrency
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel it is our human right to choose how we spend the money that we earn
attributes.background: Allow the public to purchase cryptocurrency however they see fit without the relevant banks being able to control what we can or cant spend our hard earned money on

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual banks and the FCA.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590061
